You'll be able to proceed with your online marketing efforts with a much higher degree of confidence, clarity and possibility of success.

objectives_summary: Step by step, you'll create a one-year practical action plan customized for your organization's goals, resources, priorities and strengths.
Since you have lifetime access to this course, you'll be able to come back and repeat the process next year and the year after that.
